attributes.action: Switch the multicolour flag back to the original red St George cross.
attributes.additional_details: They put our national flag back the way it should be and has been for centuries.
attributes.background: Switch the multicolour flag back to the original Red St George cross on the new England Football kit.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about the England football kit are a matter for the Football Association, not the UK Government or Parliament.
